Previous: dhāvNext: dhāv2

√dhāv1 'run'

present: [1.] dhā́vati etc.  dhā́vate etc. V.+  

[perfect: dadhāva  dadhāve  ]

aorist: [1.] dhāvyāsam   -- [3.] adadhāvat  adīdhavat   -- [5.] adhāvīt  adhāviṣṭa  

future: [1.] dhāviṣyati  dhāviṣyate   -- [2.] dhāvitā  

verbal: dhāvita E.+  dhāvitvā  -dhāvya  

secondary: intensive: dādhāvya-   -- desiderative: didhāvisa-   -- causative: dhāváyati etc. V.+  

derivatives: dhāvaka  dhāvin C.  dhāvana E.+  dhāvitṛ E.  dhā́rā V.+  

Compare roots dhan, dhanv, dhav. It is reckoned by the grammarians as filling up the defective conjugation of √sṛ.
